mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACC ( MEMBER_NO, PAYMENT_DAY, PAYMENT_COUNT, PAYMENT_MONEY, LAST_PAYMENT_COUNT, PAYMENT_ROUTE, REAL_PAYMENT_DAY, DISCOUNT_MONEY, ETC ) VALUES
( #{item.memberNo}, #{item.paymentDay}, #{item.paymentCount}, #{item.paymentMoney}, #{item.lastPaymentCount}, #{item.paymentRoute}, #{item.realPaymentDay}, #{item.discountMoney}, #{item.etc} )
